item.title: Dump on how things are made. Or done.
item.description:
How fences are made.
Automatic sewing machine.
Buttery smooth sealcoat.
Skilled tinning.
Cleaning an iPhone charging port.
Delivering a spider excavator by helicopter.
Finger-jointed lumber production line.
Fresh look for old furniture.
Hand-splitting traditional roof shingles in Romania.
If you're a fisherman and you've ever wondered how your reel works... Here's the answer.
Industrial Sewing Machine.
Kitchen countertops level tester and adjuster tool.
Making a barrel in the older days.
Meat cutting machine.
How and why they finished with those complex structures.
Physics at its finest.
Pit stop refuelling.
Rotating cabinet hinge.
Salt skimmer.
Secure your fences quickly and effectively.
Tarpaulin Knot, it allows you to grab corners of a tarp.
The Japanese style of wrapping gifts.
Wooden floors get a fresh new look.

item.title: In LA, CA a man’s father was abducted and disappeared by ICE. While trying to find him using a GPS tracker in his car, they find his now stolen truck being driven around by an ICE Bounty Hunter while he is off-duty (12/2 or 12/3)
item.dc:creator: CptCheesePants

item.title: Awesome look into apology and accountability
item.description:
Gentleman made a slight at a video, caught some learning, explained without excusing, apologized with accountability. A change in direction is cooler to see than deflecting, excusing, minimizing. Not all disabilities are visible, and not all are apparent because we all have limited knowledge. We are learning everyday (hopefully). We can strive for everyone to be able to open bottles, however that looks like for us.
Bottle opener in question.
Visual on how mobility rings help us. Be kind, be better. Cheers
item.dc:creator: theSoulciologist

item.title: Meta Glasses Guy Mad at Woman he was Recording Who Snapped His Glasses in Half ...
item.description: “She just broke my Meta glasses,” said the TikTok user, who goes by eth8n, in a video ... “You’re going to be famous on the internet!” he shouted at her through the window after getting off the train. The accused woman, however, peered back at him completely unfazed, as if to say that he had it coming. But instead of coming to his support, the internet wholeheartedly rallied behind the alleged perpetrator, celebrating the woman as a folk hero — and perfectly highlighting how the public feels about gadgets like Meta’s smart glasses. While Meta built in a small LED light in the front of its glasses to indicate when it’s recording a video, it can easily be covered by a small piece of tape, making it trivially easy to spy on strangers in public without their knowledge or consent. As Daily Dot points out, people are even selling stickers for this specific purpose. In the meantime, eth8n claims to have “filed a claim with the police and it’s a misdemeanor charge.” “What she did was assault, can get arrested for it if I see her again and felt like it,” he wrote. https://futurism.com/future-society/woman-hero-smashing-meta-smart-glasses-subway

Ukraine generally tries to target empty tankers for many very good reasons I'm sure that a second of thought will reveal. Yes even an empty oil tanker is an environmental tragedy, and we all agree. Pat on the head for you for pointing it out, Ivan]

item.title: ICE Terrorizing Neighborhood Illinois - NOT Gangs Or Criminals
item.description: Terrible things are happening outside. At any time of night and day, poor helpless people are being dragged out of their homes. They’re allowed to take only a knapsack and a little cash with them, and even then, they’re robbed of these possessions on the way. Families are torn apart; men, women and children are separated. Children come home from school to find that their parents have disappeared. Women return from shopping to find their houses sealed, their families gone. -Anne Frank 1943

26 Imgur Creator Spotlight: @ftentor did this mixed media piece. I think it's very cool. They have a lot more artwork in their posts. Head over and check 'em out.
27 Man Tax: Claudio Marchisio
I try to keep my posts "good vibe zones". So, instead of finding the one thing in here you don't like and commenting only on that, also comment about something you DID like. Balance the negativity. Love you long time. So, I made a discord server. It's a relaxed environment where you can take/donate memes to the cause, play trivia twice a week, chat about lots of topics or about nothing at all. We also have Jack Box game night and are setting up movie night! Very laid back/relaxed vibe. Come hang with us. https://discord.gg/AWFV7FT3RQ I'm also on the imgcat server for updates & fun: https://discord.gg/TpjD37jgJ9 ***Also if you miss abbiistabbii's discord community good news! Here's the new one https://discord.gg/NPStJGgARq - where everyone's reconnecting, shitposting, and hanging out again*** https://ko-fi.com/mememuseumcurator Unable to work and pretty destitute. Feel free to leave me a tip. Those that have, y'all are the bee's knees. You've helped me so much. ***Tag me if you see an artist/creator you like whose work isn't getting seen as much as it should be! Or if you are an artist/creator and want me to post something of yours, DM me!

item.title: GovBrief Today #309
item.description: The Trump administration published one of the most significant policy documents since COVID. The National Security Strategy defines America's threats and how to counter them. This one names the threat as demographic change. "Civilizational erasure" "Internal subversion" NATO allies becoming "majority non-European" These are the actual words in a document sent to Congress. The NSS is the architecture for both foreign and domestic policy. Abroad, it calls for "cultivating resistance" within allied nations whose demographics it finds threatening. At home, it frames immigration as "internal subversion." The new American doctrine is based on the Great Replacement, a racist conspiracy theory from 2011 Europe. It built on older white genocide narratives and falsely claims elites are deliberately replacing white people through immigration. The document warns European nations will become "majority non-European" within decades. U.S. definitions of "European" have never been stable. Greeks, Italians, Irish, Poles, Jews, Iberians, Balkans: none were considered white when they arrived here. If you think you're safe because you think you're white, understand that they get to decide who is. #govbrieftoday #resist Subscribe (It's Free!) - https://gbounacos.substack.com [1] https://go.govbrief.today/wc-draw-trump-prize [2] https://go.govbrief.today/trump-security-strategy [3] https://go.govbrief.today/trump-rfk-vaccine-review [4] https://go.govbrief.today/dei-purge-lawsuit [5] https://go.govbrief.today/indiana-house-redistricting [6] https://go.govbrief.today/boat-attacked-suriname [7] https://go.govbrief.today/noem-contempt-filing [8] https://go.govbrief.today/court-unseals-epstein-transcripts [9] https://go.govbrief.today/trump-birthright-scotus [10] https://go.govbrief.today/judges-blast-halligan [11] https://go.govbrief.today/grijalva-sprayed-ice [12] https://go.govbrief.today/trump-travel-ban-expand [13] https://go.govbrief.today/flight-reduction-probe [14] https://go.govbrief.today/trump-guantanamo-setback Subscribe (It's Free!) - https://gbounacos.substack.com
